summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1341, for the improvement of East Pike Street from Thirty-seventh Avenue to Thirty-eighth Avenue; certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 14987 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
